General.Name: Sunny Optical Technology Group Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Sunny Optical Technology (Group) Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in designing, researching, developing, manufacturing, and selling optical and optical related products, and scientific instruments. Its Optical Components segment offers vehicle lens sets and optical parts for vehicle light detection and ranging; and virtual reality (VR) positioning and handset lens sets, and glass spherical lenses for digital cameras and other optical components. The company's Optoelectronic Products segment provides vehicle modules, VR folded path and visual modules, handset camera modules, and other optoelectronic modules. Its Optical Instruments segment offers intelligent inspection equipment and microscopes. It also offers mobile phone camera modules; automotive lens, such as headlight, HUD, LiDAR, optical elements, automotive camera modules, and active safety warning systems; infrared thermal imaging lens, surveillance lens, and video conference lens; and mobile phone parts inspection equipment and automotive camera module manufacturing equipment. In addition, the company provides life science, industrial inspection, metallurgical, polarization, and stereo microscope instruments; image analysis software; AR/VR optic components and sensors, and system modules; location and recognition systems; and microbes and pathological medical inspection devices. It operates in the People's Republic of China, the rest of Asia, Europe, North America, and internationally. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Yuyao, China.
